div.pre: 1302 Edremit (anc. Adramyteum), Mysia, 1954 Burial: c. 210 B.C. Contents: 19+ AR Alexander III: 10 late post. tetradr. (Odes- sus 1, Mytilene 2, Pergamum 1, Per- gamum or Mytilene 1, Priene 1, Miletus 1, Magnesia 1,Caria 1, Sillyum 1) Antigonus Gonatas: 1 tetradr. Lysimachus: 2 lifetime tetradr. (Lamp- sacus 1, Magnesia 1) 2 post. tetradr. (Cius 1, unc. mint 1) Attalus II: 2 tetradr. Antiochus II: 2 tetradr. (Lampsacus 1 as WSM 1536 f.; Smyrna 1 as WSM 1499) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, RN 1963, p. 26, note 1. Seyrig's list of varieties is in ANS
